name: HomeConnectWasher
0:
”Alexa, start My Washer”
”Alexa, tell my Washer to run with Cotton Eco and be finished in five hours”
”Alexa, ask My Washer when the laundry will be ready”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my washer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this Home Connect Washer skill for Amazon Alexa, you can control and monitor the most important functions of your washer via Amazon Alexa, such as starting a program or getting notifications.

Features:
* Support of many programs and options (depending on your model)
* Use your washer in Alexa routines: turn it on (only supported by certain washers), off or start a program.
* Easier and more natural interaction with the appliance:
 > Add options and stain treatments one by one
 > Use the programs and selections you already made on the washer's panel
* Shortcut: You can now enter Assist mode without launching the skill beforehand (“Alexa, tell My Washer to assist me.”)
* Contextual help messages: Say “more” or “help” to get further information at any point in the dialogue
* Stop finished program signal (“Alexa, tell My Washer to stop beeping.”)
* Decide on subject of information that you expect to receive Alexa Notifications about: program is finished or action needed.

Selection of supported commands:
“Alexa, tell My Washer to start the Cotton program.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to start Mix.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to set the temperature to cold.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to start the laundry.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to be finished in 4 hours.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to start the Cotton Eco program with Extra Rinse and finish in six hours.”
“Alexa, ask My Washer when the laundry will be done.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to set the spin speed to 400.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to stop beeping.”
“Alexa, ask My Washer to turn off.”
“Alexa, ask My Washer for the status.”
“Alexa, tell My Washer to activate notifications.”
“Alexa, ask My Washer if I can reload the laundry.”
“Alexa, ask My Washer if it can launder my money.”

Shorter commands for Alexa Smart Home:
"Alexa, turn on Washer" (only supported by certain washers)
"Alexa, turn off Washer"
* Use the name you chose for your washer in the Alexa app

Further tips:
* Some models need to be manually turned on to start the program.
* Make sure remote start is activated on your washer to use this skill.
* In order to use this skill, you need to link your Home Connect account to Alexa. You can register an account in the Home Connect app. Please also make sure that you pair your washer with the Home Connect app.
* On some models, the child lock functionality is not supported. Please make sure that your child does not play with the skill.
* If you have any issues with the skill, please try re-enabling it.
* This skill supports washer models with the Home Connect functionality from Bosch, Siemens and Gaggenau.

Please be aware that the skill:
* does not support washer-dryer models,
* might not support all home appliance features as available in the Home Connect app. 
We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience. If you have any questions or comments regarding the skill, please send them via email to the support address below.

Contact and feedback:
For more information about the Home Connect skills please visit: www.home-connect.com/alexa
In case you have questions or comments, just send an email to service.us@home-connect.com.

Your Home Connect Team
